keyFacts: The invoice details multiple shipments associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein and others.
Total charges for the invoice amount to USD $371.33.
Shipments were picked up on December 2, 2003, and delivered on December 5, 2003.
G. Maxwell and David Tang are also involved in the shipments alongside Epstein.
The document includes various charges, discounts, and shipment details for FedEx services.
